name: movary
description: Movary is a self-hosted movie tracking and stats platform using the Trakt API. It allows users to track watched movies, generate charts, and explore statistics with a self-hosted database and UI.
features: Watch tracking: Log movies you've watched with dates and ratings to build a personal viewing history.
Trakt integration: Sync your watch history with Trakt to maintain consistent data across platforms and services.
Statistics dashboard: View charts showing movies watched over time, favorite genres, and viewing patterns.
Movie database: Access metadata including posters, descriptions, and cast information from integrated APIs.
Personal ratings: Rate movies on your own scale and track how your opinions compare to community averages.
Watchlist management: Maintain a list of movies you want to watch with priority sorting and filtering options.
Year in review: Generate annual summaries showing total movies watched, top genres, and viewing milestones.
Self-hosted data: Keep your viewing history and preferences on your own server for complete privacy control.
